name: The Last Mana
description:
In a world now on the brink, a soldier finds himself stranded on an arid and deserted beach... What will his fate be?

Fight monsters and gain even more powerful weaponry in this DarkFantasy RPG!

What to expect from this Game:

Crafting: Crafting items instead of buying them.

OpenMap: Explore a large map with many dungeons to explore

Bosses: Defeat bosses with unique abilities Secrets: Find secret rooms!

Custom Level Advancement: Use TP (Talent Point) To level up and change a characteristic of your choice!

Many Enemies + Bestiary + Item LORE : Defeat enemies and pin them on your bestiary! Discover new items and read about their history!

Upgrade your armaments! And become invincible!: That's right, you can upgrade your weapons!

Please write to me for problems. My discord: Un_bimbo_barbuto#0791
